distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Airlines_Booking.csv dataset

distribution.name: customer_booking.csv
distribution.description:
File Type: CSV (Comma Separated Values)

File Description: This file contains the airlines booking, Each row in the file represents a single booking, and the columns contain various attributes related to the booking, such as the number of passengers, sales channel, trip type, purchase lead time, length of stay, flight hour, flight day, route, booking origin, and various flags indicating if the customer wanted extra baggage, preferred seat, or in-flight meals. The file also includes the total flight duration and a flag indicating if the booking was completed.



File Attributes:

The first row of the file contains the column names.
The remaining rows contain the actual data.
The file uses commas to separate the values in each row.
The file not contain missing or null values.
The file not contain outliers or errors, Duplicate values.

field.name: trip_type
field.description: Round Trip, One Way, Circle Trip

field.name: purchase_lead
field.description: number of days between travel date and booking date

field.name: length_of_stay
field.description: number of days spent at destination

field.name: flight_day
field.description: day of week of flight departure

field.name: booking_origin
field.description: country from where booking was made

field.name: wants_extra_baggage
field.description: customer wanted extra baggage in the booking

field.name: wants_preferred_seat
field.description: customer wanted a preferred seat in the booking

field.name: wants_in_flight_meals
field.description: customer wanted in-flight meals in the booking

name: Airlines_Booking.csv
description:
This dataset contains information about airline bookings, including the number of passengers, sales channel, trip type, purchase lead time, length of stay, flight hour, flight day, route, booking origin, and various flags indicating if the customer wanted extra baggage, preferred seat, or in-flight meals. The dataset also includes the total flight duration and a flag indicating if the booking was completed. This information can be used for various analyses, such as predicting demand, identifying popular routes, and understanding customer preferences.

## **Column Description:**

**num_passengers** = number of passengers travelling

**sales_channel** = sales channel booking was made on

**trip_type** = trip Type (Round Trip, One Way, Circle Trip)

**purchase_lead** = number of days between travel date and booking date

**length_of_stay** = number of days spent at destination

**flight_hour** = hour of flight departure

**flight_day** = day of week of flight departure

**route = origin** -> destination flight route

**booking_origin** = country from where booking was made

**wants_extra_baggage** = if the customer wanted extra baggage in the booking

**wants_preferred_seat** = if the customer wanted a preferred seat in the booking

**wants_in_flight_meals** = if the customer wanted in-flight meals in the booking

**flight_duration** = total duration of flight (in hours)

**booking_complete** = flag indicating if the customer completed the booking
